thread.title: US transport plane crashes at Jalalabad airport in Afghanistan
thread.title_full: US transport plane crashes at Jalalabad airport in Afghanistan

author: eTN Global Editor
title: US transport plane crashes at Jalalabad airport in Afghanistan
text:
US transport plane crashes at Jalalabad airport in Afghanistan   
Oct 01, 2015 eTN   
JALALABAD, Afghanistan - An American C-130 transport plane crashed near Jalalabad, Afghanistan, shortly after midnight local time (1930 GMT Thursday), according to U.S. defense officials. 
The crash happened near the city's airport, close to the eastern border with Pakistan. 
The status of passenger members and crew on the plane was unknown, the official said. 
The C-130 Hercules has been used by the American military since the 1950s and has been a workhorse of its Afghanistan operations.
